alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 11:53AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lander and northwestern Nye Counties through 1230 PM PDT... At 1152 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of Gabbs, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Lander and northwestern Nye Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
